name: Aperture (Hu Chi)
description:
PLEASE NOTE:

The last update of this game is on July 2019. 

This project is currently on hold. Although the game can be played from start to finish, I still want to improve the overall gameplay experience. I intend to finish it (or even remake) in the future. 

There is currently a public downloadable version of the current progress. It is currently released for portfolio purposes.
